snippet.title: What is EXR? Make Indoor Rowing Workouts Fun | EXR App Guide
snippet.description:
The era of boring rowing workouts is over. EXR’s Community Manager Ami shows you how the virtual rowing app helps you row more while having fun. With EXR, you explore iconic 3D locations with rowers from all over the world. Race online, join events and beat rowing challenges. Endless training opportunities help you become fitter, faster, and stronger.

___

Download  EXR — the app that connects you with the global rowing community: row in virtual worlds, race your friends online and unlock achievements! Spend more time on your rowing ergometer thanks to group rowing events, challenges and guided workouts. Level up your fitness with EXR today: https://exrgame.com/ 
___

Join EXR and become a part of the world’s biggest indoor rowing community!

Follow EXR on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/exrgame/ 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/exrgame/ 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHFQUJrXrNzDl-CFZO6IfaQ 

Join the Facebook EXR Community:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/exrgame 
Join EXR on Discord:
https://discord.gg/QuNPgtCNuc 
Join the EXR subreddit:
https://www.reddit.com/r/EXRofficial/ 
Join the EXR Strava Club:
https://www.strava.com/clubs/739056 
___
What is EXR?

Starring: Ami Kucharek
Creative Director: Charlotte Vandeloo
Video created for EXR — The app that makes indoor rowing fun
